item.title: How to make object move in Unity
item.description:
String header = "The post about coding :)";

Today I’ll tell about how to have the ship move by keyboard arrows.

item.title: Brick (Block) Breaker

item.title: Number Wizard
item.description: This is the first game I’ve ever made. The goal of this game is to pick a number. After that the machine will guess the number. Play the game! See the source
